nodes.text: A Podracer pilot with green skin competed in Podraces around 22 BBY, flying an orange Podracer. The pilot was active on the Mid Rim planet of Mon Gazza around that time, participating in the first qualifying race for the Mon Gazza Maze Podrace event. However, the pilot lost the qualifier to the Twi'lek pilot Kidd Kareen. Despite losing the qualifier, the green-skinned pilot did manage to beat out several other competitors. During the race with Kareen, the pilot wore a brown shirt and cap, along with goggles.
The pilot was created by Henry Gilroy and appeared in the 2008 graphic novella The Clone Wars: Crash Course, which was illustrated by Matthew and Shawn Fillbach and colored by Ronda Pattison.
